disposition.translation[0].definitions[0: a particular type of character which makes someone likely to behave or react in a certain way
have a cheerful/sunny etc disposition (=have a happy character)
The film is not suitable for people of a nervous disposition.
disposition.translation[0].definitions[1: a tendency or willingness to behave in a particular way
Neither side shows the slightest disposition to compromise.
have/show a disposition to do something
Most children have a disposition towards obedience.
disposition.translation[0].definitions[2: the position or arrangement of something in a particular place
a map showing the disposition of American forces
disposition.translation[0].definitions[3: the way in which something is dealt with or used
A solicitor advised him as to the disposition of the money.
disposition.translation[0].definitions[4: the act of formally giving property to someone
the disposition of assets on death
